text: Hamza Saadeh, known by the nickname Absorber, is an American content creator and digital influencer of Arab descent. He was born on March 17, 2003, in New Jersey, United States. Hamza gained prominence in the digital content creation field through videos that combine comedy, voice impersonations, magic tricks, and video games like Fortnite. He has built a massive community of followers on platforms such as YouTube and TikTok, where he has over 2 million subscribers on YouTube and 6 million followers on TikTok. ==References== Category:2003 births Category:Living people
title: Hamza Saadeh
